document_notes.text:
This update for frr fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-31948: Fixed denial of service due to malformed Prefix SID attribute in BGP Update packet (bsc#1222518)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1, an attacker using a malformed Prefix SID attribute in a BGP UPDATE packet can cause the bgpd daemon to crash.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
